TEXT.TITLE: MIM RAISES COPPER PRICES BY 20 DOLLARS
TEXT.BODY: Mount Isa Mines Ltd <MIMA.S> said it raised its copper prices by 20 dlrs to 2,220 dlrs per tonne for cathodes and to 2,387.50 dlrs per tonne for standard rods, effective June 17. REUTER
